law.text: The determinations required by KRS 45A.085(1), (3), (6), and (7); 45A.090(1), (2) and (3); 45A.095; 45A.105; 45A.110(1); 45A.120(3); and 45A.130(1) shall be final and conclusive unless they are clearly erroneous, arbitrary, capricious, or contrary to law.
law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 22, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 32, effective January 1, 1979.
